<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"현금영수증 신청정보 수정 (무통장 입금 주문)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/guest/orders/{orderNo}/cashReceipt"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>




## 부가설명 및 특이사항
현금영수증 발급을 신청한 무통장입금 주문의 현금영수증 신청 정보를 수정하는 API입니다.<br />
주문이 입금 대기상태인 경우에만 수정 가능합니다.<br />


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orderNo","in":"path","description":"주문번호","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"2020042100000001"},{"name":"Version","in":"header","description":"API 버전","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"1.0"},{"name":"clientId","in":"header","description":"쇼핑몰 클라이언트 아이디","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-client-id"},{"name":"platform","in":"header","description":"클라이언트 플랫폼 (PC, MOBILE_WEB, AOS, IOS)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"PC"},{"name":"language","in":"header","description":"언어 (기본 값: ko)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"ko"},{"name":"guestToken","in":"header","description":"guestToken","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"12121a3-123123-1213"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"cashReceiptKeyType":{"type":"string","description":"현금영수증 발급 키 타입 (nullable)","example":"MOBILE_NO","enum":["CARD_NO: 카드번호","MOBILE_NO: 휴대폰번호","BUSINESS_NO: 사업자 번호","VOLUNTARY_NO: 자진발급 번호 (국세청 지정 고정번호)"]},"cashReceiptKey":{"type":"string","description":"발급용도에 따른 키 (휴대폰번호, 사업자번호 등) (nullable)","example":"01012345678"},"cashReceiptIssuePurposeType":{"type":"string","description":"현금영수증 발급 타입 (nullable)","example":"INCOME_TAX_DEDUCTION","enum":["INCOME_TAX_DEDUCTION: 소득공제용","PROOF_EXPENDITURE: 지출증빙용","VOLUNTARY: 자진발급"]}},"description":"","title":"profile-orders-orderNo-cashReceipt811895579"},"examples":{"put-guest-orders-order-no-cash-receipt":{"value":"{\"cashReceiptIssuePurposeType\":\"INCOME_TAX_DEDUCTION\",\"cashReceiptKeyType\":\"MOBILE_NO\",\"cashReceiptKey\":\"123456\"}"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"200","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"cashReceiptKeyType":{"type":"string","description":"현금영수증 발급 키 타입","example":"MOBILE_NO","enum":["CARD_NO: 카드번호","MOBILE_NO: 휴대폰번호","BUSINESS_NO: 사업자 번호","VOLUNTARY_NO: 자진발급 번호 (국세청 지정 고정번호)"]},"cashReceiptKey":{"type":"string","description":"발급용도에 따른 키 (휴대폰번호, 사업자번호 등)","example":"01012345678"},"cashReceiptIssuePurposeType":{"type":"string","description":"현금영수증 발급 타입","example":"INCOME_TAX_DEDUCTION","enum":["INCOME_TAX_DEDUCTION: 소득공제용","PROOF_EXPENDITURE: 지출증빙용","VOLUNTARY: 자진발급"]}},"description":"","title":"profile-orders-orderNo-cashReceipt-1259729395"},"examples":{"put-guest-orders-order-no-cash-receipt":{"value":"{\"cashReceiptIssuePurposeType\":\"INCOME_TAX_DEDUCTION\",\"cashReceiptKeyType\":\"CARD_NO\",\"cashReceiptKey\":\"\"}"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
